968aae8e-da6f-41c5-bd88-d01638238150.name: Fragile (Unnatural)
968aae8e-da6f-41c5-bd88-d01638238150.notes: Automatically fail HT roll to stay alive if reduced to -HP or below

d30d5492-97c4-4b43-b57c-96ebf8e7ba62.text: The undead templates in Template Toolkit 2 omit several traits that may be common, but are not universal. The ones explicitly called out are listed here.
